descriptions.en:
Spawns a <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 5.05x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.05x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 33%|66%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

While Charging a Grenade:
Chaotic Exchanger grants 20% Damage Resist.

Grenade Hits proc Chaotic Exchange, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>2000% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1000%] Additional Base Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
4 second cooldown between Activations.

Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你蓄力手雷时：
获得 20% 的伤害抗性。

手雷命中会触发混沌交易，为你提供 <:pve:922884406073507930>2000% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1000%] 额外基础手榴弹充能速率 1.75 秒。
触发冷却时间 4 秒。

如果敌人被蓄力漩涡手雷的初始爆炸和最后几次伤害命中，则可以触发两次混沌交易。
+20 稳定性，-30 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon or Grenade Kill:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% Increased Damage and 20 Handling for 4.5 seconds.

Grenade Kills grant all 5 stacks.
Buff is refreshed on Weapon or Grenade Kills.
descriptions.es:
Bajas con el Arma o Granadas otorgan:
Aumento de daño:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3%
+20 al manejo

El bufo se renueva con cada baja. Baja con granada otorga la maxima cantidad de Daño

Mejorado: La duracion del bufo aumenta a 5 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当使用武器或手雷完成击杀时：
根据叠加层数获得 6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% 伤害提升，并且 +20 操控性，持续 4.5 秒。

增益持续时间可在击杀时刷新。手雷击杀直接获得 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
Increases Kinetic Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

After 🡅1.4 seconds of aiming-down-sights without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.1 seconds.
Each stack of Gathering Light improves this weapon's reload, handling, and target acquisition.

Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每次填装两发弹药。
-35 填装速度。

descriptions.en: Damaging an opponent temporarily increases speed and handling.
Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

After using your Class Ability:
The next Weapon Kill spawns an Orb of Power.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant (?)%|(?)%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Currently, equipping multiple copies of the Mod causes additional Orbs of Power to spawn at the world origin. (Why?)

For one bullet only:
• 20 Aim Assist
• 25 Range
• -5% Accuracy Cone Size
• -10% Accuracy Cone Growth

3.1 seconds cooldown after firing.
descriptions.zh-chs:
第一发子弹:
•  +20 瞄准辅助
•  +25 射程
•  -5% 精度锥角尺寸
•  -10% 精度锥角增长

开火后触发 3.1 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en: Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that has no damage falloff and deals 30% increased damage in PVE.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 15% Bodyshot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on the Precision Multiplier.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Total damage remains the same.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Finishers with no active Armor Charge Stacks grant 1|2|3 Stacks of Armor Charge with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Passively Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

On Precision Kill or upon scoring [?] kills within [?] seconds of each with a weapon that cannot deal precision damage:
Spawns a Threadling on Enemy Death Location.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a <:void:720178940240461864>Void or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

While within 15 metres of an enemy:
Multi-Dodge Ready appears on the Buff List.

After Dodging within 15 metres of an Enemy:
You can dodge an unlimited amount of times for 6 seconds.
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.

Multi-Dodge Dodges don't activate Mods or Aspects that activate on Class Ability Usage.

Effect immediately ends if you are over 15 metres away from an Enemy while Multi-Dodge is active.

Finishing a reload Overflows the Magazine by 10% for each ally within 15 meters.

Maxes out at 50% increased Magazine Capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内每有一名盟友：
填装时会过量填充 10% 的弹匣，最高 50%。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
Spawns a Large <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.

Low Tier ([Tier 1 and 2](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant)) Minor Combatants only spawn a Medium <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal.

5 second cooldown if 5 Stasis Crystals are simultaneously active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
在目标附近生成一块<:stasis:915198000727461909>冰影水晶。
普通敌人生成中型水晶，高阶敌人生成大型水晶。

生成 5 块水晶后将进入 5 秒冷却。

descriptions.en: Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Powered Hits grant a 3% Damage Buff for 3.5 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Damage Buff.

Additional Powered Hits refresh the duration. Blocking removes all stacks.

🡅 Buff duration is increased.

On Miss:
Primary Weapons have a 🡅40% chance to refund ammo.
Special and Power Weapons have a 🡅25% chance to refund ammo.

🡅 Ammo Refund chance is increased by an additive 5%(?).

Upon scoring multiple hits within (?) seconds of each:
Automatically shoots a Tracking Rocket that matches Weapon's Elemental Damage Type.

Rockets deal <:pve:922884406073507930>22.4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[14] impact and <:pve:922884406073507930>24 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15] explosive damage on hit and inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).

% of Magazine Capacity as hits required:
• Pulse Rifles, Hand Cannons, Submachine Guns: 45%
• Machine Guns: 25%
• Fusion Rifles, Grenade Launchers: unknown

On Precision Kill:
Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>123.89 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[95.3] damage that matches the Element of the weapon over a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed.
This weapon is Full Auto, does extra damage to Cabal, and penetrates Phalanx shields.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Passively increases damage dealt to Overshields and Combatant Shields:
• 10% Increase: PvE Combatant Shields
• 20% Increase: Overshields

🡅 Damage dealt to Overshields is increased.

Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard. Sets Class Ability Cooldown to Rally Barricade's.

On Glacial Guard Cast:
Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds and applies 40 Slow Stacks to PvE Combatants within 7 meters.

Shielded:
• Grants a 100 HP Overshield <:pve:922884406073507930>that provides 62.5% Damage Resistance in PVE.
• Prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
• Cannot regain Class Ability Energy while active.
• Taking damage refreshes buff duration.
• Class Ability activation removes the buff.

Upon Sliding:
• Refills 15% of the Magazine
• 20 Range and 30 Stability for 3 seconds or until firing

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.

🡅 Stronger Effect.

After not dealing or receiving damage for at least 5 seconds:
• 20 Range and 20 Handling
• 10.78% Increased Damage against PvE Combatants. Linear Fusion Rifles only receive an 8.88% Damage Increase.
• 0.85x Draw Time Multiplier on Bows.

Buff activates for 2 seconds after dealing or receiving damage.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.
Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.

On Precision Hit:
0.75x Draw Time Multiplier for 3 seconds.
descriptions.es:
En tiros de Precision:
Reduce en un 25% el tiempo de tensado durante 3 segundos

Aumentado: Aumenta la duracion del bufo a 4 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准命中时：
-25% 蓄力时间，持续 3 秒。

descriptions.en:
While below 113 HP:
Linearly grants up to 100 Reload Speed, and a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 113 生命值时：
最高 +100 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数

根据生命值降低而线性提升增益效果。

descriptions.en: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.
Poison final blows return ammo to the magazine.

Passively grants +20 Airborne Effectiveness.

After sprinting for 2 seconds, and if used while being airborne:
Shoulder Charge Abilities deal 225% increased impact damage.
Frozen enemies will not take increased Melee Damage while Peregrine Strike is active.

On Powered Melee Kills:
Grants <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility and restores Health.

(Finishers) increase the duration of the Void Invisibility and restore additional health.

Invisibility Duration || Health based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant):
• Minors: 6.8 seconds (9.8s) || 100 HP (?)
• Elites, Enemy Players: 9.8s (12.7s) || ? HP (200 HP)
• Minibosses = 12.8s (15.8s) || ? HP (200 HP)
• Bosses = 13.3s || 200 HP (Not Finishable)

Echo of Persistence increases the <:void:720178940240461864>Void Invisibility duration by 41.5%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀获得<:void:720178940240461864>虚空隐身，并恢复 [?] 生命值。
（终结技的效果更显著）

隐身持续时间（使用终结技的效果）：
普通敌人 = 6.8 秒（9.8）
精英敌人/守护者 = 9.8 秒 （12.7）
次级首领 = 12.8 秒 （15.8）
首领 = 13.3 秒

坚韧回声可增加 41.5% <:void:720178940240461864>虚空隐身的持续时间。

首领和载具无法被终结。

descriptions.en:
During a slide, after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds:
Projects a 180° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles for 0.45 seconds.

Passively Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后滑行：
产生一个 180° 的正面护盾，可以反弹伤害和弹道。

滑行距离增加33%。

descriptions.en:
Grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit per Precision Hit, improving Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds.

• 2 | 12 | 14 | 18 | 25 Stability
• 5 | 30 | 35 | 42 | 60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x | 0.96x | 0.95x | 0.945x | 0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

If Magazine is at or above maximum capacity:
25% Increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>444 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[163] damage in a [?] meter radius.

Passively grants 30 Magazine Size. (Identical to Extended Mag)

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

While Crouched:
• 30 Handling and 20 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% Horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+30 操控性，+20 稳定性， -40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长, -80% 横向后座力。

该特性对融合步枪的效果减半。

descriptions.en:
Provides a stacking Damage Buff on Weapon Kills:
10% | 21% | 33.1% increased damage for 🡅5 seconds.
Buff Refreshed on Kill.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Damaging a combatant heals the wielder.

While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.
Kills with this weapon cause enemy targets to detonate and spawn Void projectiles that track targets.

Passively Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Reduces Firing Delay for 🡅2.75 seconds upon readying the weapon after scoring a kill or multiple Precision Hits within 4 seconds of each with a different weapon.

Timer starts upon readying. Buff can be stowed for 5 seconds.

Firing Delay is reduced by 30% on SMGs and Machine Guns and by 40% on other archetypes.

Activation progress on Precision Hits:
• Bows, Linear Fusion/Sniper Rifles, Shotguns: 50%
• Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Scout Rifles: 17.5%
• Auto/Trace/Pulse Rifles, SMGs, Machine Guns: 8%

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 0.25 seconds.

1 second after stowing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While above 50% Magazine:
Direct Hits create a Stasis burst which applies 50 Slow for <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst. (Wolfpack Rounds are considered separate shots.)

Whisper of Durance increases slow duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] seconds

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

On Weapon Kill for 5 seconds:
15% Increased damage and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9 meters per second.

Kills refresh the timer. Remains active even if stowed.
descriptions.es:
En baja con Espada:
Aumento de 15% al Daño, y pone a la velocidad de movimiento hacia adelante a 9 metros por segundo durante [?] segundos

Se mantiene activo al guardar la espada

Mejorado: Aumenta la duración del bufo a [?] segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
当刀剑击杀时：
提高 15% 伤害，增加移动和冲刺速度，增加挥舞刀剑的前冲距离，持续 [?] 秒。

武器收起时依然生效。

descriptions.en:
Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a scaling Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the [scaling is continuous](https://i.ibb.co/KbxNKvj/Target-Lock-Explanation.png).
Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

Damage buff when reaching 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
16.73% | 23.47% | 29.28% | 34.73% | 40%

% of the Magazine as Hits required for each Stack:
12.5% | 35.5% | 54.5% | 74.5% | 110.5%

Assuming no missed shots, it provides a ~25% Damage Buff on average after firing 100% of the Magazine.
Radar immediately returns when no longer Aiming Down Sights. (Normally takes 1.5 seconds)

Grants Grenade Ability Energy upon dealing Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gain with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

Hybrid melee/ranged polearm with a frontal shield.
Generates energy on dealing ranged damage.

[Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield, depleting energy over time
[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact.

Fusion Grenade Kills grant Grenade Energy based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant):
• 25%: Minors
• 50%: Elites
• 100%: Enemy Players, Minibosses, Bosses
descriptions.zh-chs:
让融合手雷自带快速投掷能力，并且在撞击物体时爆炸。

使用融合手雷击杀敌人可以获得手雷能量。
对于普通敌人，获得25%的能量；
对于精英敌人，获得50%的能量；
对于守护者、次级首领、首领，获得100%的能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants Burning Fists on (Glaive) Melee Kill, granting Increased (Glaive) Melee Damage for 5 seconds.

(Glaive) Melee Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战击杀后获得“燃烧之拳”：
“燃烧之拳”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

descriptions.en:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Grants an extra Scatter Grenade Ability Charge.

Scatter Grenades receive Chaos Accelerant's Tracking Bonus.
Does not stack with Chaos Accelerant's Bonus.

While within 15 meters of 2 Allies:
20% Increased Precision Damage

🡅 Grants 10 Handling while the perk is active.

All equipped weapons get refilled from reserves on melee kills.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

While aiming-down-sights at an Enemy:
Rockets track the targeted enemy.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>Diminshed effectiveness in PVP.

Tracking persists for 1 second after not aiming at the enemy.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.
Each successive shot has more damage and more spread.

Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Upon readying the weapon within 10 seconds of scoring Kills with your other weapons:
Overflows Magazine from reserves based on the amount of kills achieved within 10 seconds of each.

Overflow amount maxes out at 150% of the Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.

Magazine Capacity Increase per Kill:
<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 10%
<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%

Cannot be reactivated until all shots loaded by the perk shots are fired.

🡅 Currently does nothing.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upon readying the weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用其他武器达成最后一击后 3 秒内切换到该武器：

+20% 伤害，+15 操控性，持续 7 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Upon dealing Melee Damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
<:pve:922884406073507930>500% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] increased damage and 100 Handling for 10 seconds or until firing a full burst.

4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate the perk.
descriptions.zh-chs:
对 15 米范围内的敌人造成近战伤害后：
提升 <:pve:922884406073507930>500% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] 伤害，并 +100 操控性，持续 10 秒或直到下次射击。

4 秒冷却时间。武器在收起时也可触发。

需要冲刺或滑行的充能近战以及弹道猛击均不会触发该特性。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

After dealing Non-Precision Weapon Damage:
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 0.1175
• [?] Aim Assist

Buff lasts 0.55 seconds. Dealing additional Non-Precision Damage refreshes the timer.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器造成非精准伤害后：
0.55 秒内 +8% 伤害，+[?] 瞄准辅助。
造成非精准伤害将刷新计时器。

descriptions.en:
After not shooting for 🡅3.3 seconds:
Refills 10% of Magazine Capacity from reserves every 🡅3.7 seconds up to double the capacity.

🡅 Refill Delays are decreased by 0.3 seconds.
Increases Shotgun Pellet Spread by 7.5%
descriptions.zh-chs: +7.5% 霰弹枪弹片散布。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.

Elemental Kill grant 1 Stack of Recombination.
Maximum of 10 stacks.

Each Stack increases the damage of the next shot by <:pve:922884406073507930>10% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5%].

One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher with remote detonation.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

Intrinsically grants Fastball to all grenades.

Enhances Tripmine Grenades:
• 14% Increased Explosion Damage
• Explosion Length and Width are increased to 14 meters
• Explosion no longer deals self-damage and has no damage falloff
• Lasts 30 seconds (10s 🠚 30s)
• Increases Tripmine Durability to 100 HP with 50% Damage Resist

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Ability Damage recharges 33% of Tripmine Grenade Ability. Tripmine and Knife Trick hits count as 2 instances of Solar Ability Damage if the target survives.
descriptions.zh-chs:
让手雷自带快速投掷能力。

增强感应手雷：
• 爆炸伤害增加 14%。爆炸的长度和宽度增加到 14 米。
• 爆炸不再造成自我伤害，并且没有伤害衰减。
• 持续 30 秒。(10s -> 30s)
• 将感应手雷的耐久度提高到 100 生命值，并有 50% 的伤害抵抗。

<:solar:720178909361995786>烈日技能伤害可为感应手雷充能 33%。
骨灰余烬可让感应手雷算作 2 次烈日技能伤害。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants +50 Airborne Effectiveness, +100 Handling and +100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.

Upon readying a sidearm while at Critical Health:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>100% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[35%] increased damage until no longer at Critical Health.
• Refreshes sidearm magazine.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

While within 15 meters of 1 enemy:
🡅19 Stability, 15 Reload Speed, and 0.75x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier

While within 15 meters of 2+ enemies:
🡅44 Stability, 60 Reload Speed, and 0.56x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier

🡅 Grants 4 more stability when active.

Breaking an enemy shield transfers one bullet from reserves. Breaking a combatant shield—or the shield of a Guardian using a Super—with that shield's energy type grants bonus damage for the rest of the magazine.

On Weapon Kill, for 8.5 seconds:
Grants 100 Handling and a 0.825x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier to all weapons.

Additional kills while the perk is active refresh the duration to 6.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
所有武器 +100 操控性，0.825x 操控动画系数，持续8.5 秒。

该增益持续时间可以刷新，最长 6.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights:
10% Increased Effective Zoom and 5% Faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out the Damage and Aim Assist Falloff by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

Upon killing multiple enemies within 3(?) seconds of each:
6.25% Increased Sprinting Speed for 10 seconds.

Not refreshable. Maximum Sprint Speed increase is capped at 12.5%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器 3 秒内击败多个目标：
提升冲刺速度，持续 10 秒。

持续时间无法被刷新。

最高冲刺速度为初始值的 112.5%。

守护者、强力战斗人员、高价值目标会更快地触发此增益。

descriptions.en:
Grants 30 Stow Handling while sprinting.

Cancelling spring by Aiming Down Sights provides the Handling benefit to ADS as well.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Swords are granted 30|50|60 Charge Rate with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Glaive Projectile Hits grant an additional (?)|(?)|15% Weapon Energy on hits.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

Weapon Kills grant Melee Ability Energy:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 🡅11%
• Most <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 🡅22%

Kills with Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles only provide 🡅11%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.

🡅 Melee Ability Energy gains are increased by 10%. (e.g. 10% » 11%)

Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Melee Ability Charge.

Cloaking allies grants 50% Melee Energy per ally made invisible.

Wearing Omnioculus grants <:pve:922884406073507930>50% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Damage Resist while invisible.

Being made invisible thanks to an Omnioculus Hunter grants <:pve:922884406073507930>50% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Damage Resist

Wearing Omnioculus and being made invisible by another Omnioculus Hunter grants <:pve:922884406073507930>75% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[19%] Damage Resist.

Damage Resistance does not apply in Super.

Spawns a <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.1% to 1.33%. Average of 83.5 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 5.05x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.05x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 33%|66%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Weapon Kills grant a stacking Damage Buff until stowing or reloading the weapon.

Maximum of 3 stacks.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 10% | 20% | 30% increased damage
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 5% | 10% | 15% increased damage
Refills 50% of the Magazine on Elemental, Barrier, or Guardian Shield Breaks.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Shotguns.

If your Void Melee Ability is Charged:
Shotgun Kills consume your Melee Ability and grant a 45 HP Void Overshield.

Shotgun Kills restore Melee Ability Energy based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant).
• 5%: Tier 1 Minors
• 9%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 10%: Enemy Players
• 13%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 25%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4 Elites, Minibosses, Bosses

Scoring 3 Precision Hits refunds 1 Ammo to Magazine.

Counter is reset if no Precision Hits are scored within 🡅3 seconds.

🡅 Allowed time between Precision Hits is increased by 1 second.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to Kinetic Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

While Aiming Down Sights:
10 Aim Assist, and 2.5% Reduced Aiming-Down-Sights Movement Speed Penalty.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
+10 瞄准辅助，-2.5% 瞄准移动速度惩罚。

descriptions.en:
Class Ability Usage reloads all weapons and grants Wraithmetal Mail for 9 seconds.

Wraithmetal Mail grants:
• 50 Mobility
• 100 Reload Speed and Handling
• 0.7x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%

While in Arc Staff:
Hits grant a stack of Synapse Junctions for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 Stacks.

Synapse Junctions:
x1 = 13.5% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain
x2 = 28.8% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain
x3 = 46.2% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain

Arcbolt Grenades have an additive 25% Chance per Hit to recharge your Grenade Ability.

Arcbolt Grenades can chain up to 4 times (from 3).

While above 50% Magazine Capacity:
🡅55 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier.

🡅 Reload Speed bonus is increased by 5.

Arcstrider Subclass Only.

Receiving or Dealing Melee Damage grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until Melee Hit.

Cross Counter grants 200% Increased Melee Damage and restores ?HP on Melee Hits.

Cross Counter's bonus is reduced to 80% when combined with One-Two Punch.

On Weapon Kill:
Triggers an explosion matching the weapon's element that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>84 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[56] damage over a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).

🡅 Passively grants 20 Ammo Capacity (Swords) and 20 Inventory Size. (Identical to a Reserves Mod)
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

On Weapon Kill, for 6 seconds:
37.5% Decreased Charge/Draw Time.

Kills while the perk active add 🡅5 seconds to the duration up to 20 seconds.

🡅 Additional kills add 1 more second to the duration.
One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.

Powered Melee Kills and Finishers apply weaken (increasing damage taken by 30%) and blind in a radius around the enemy.
Duration and Range are dependent on Enemy Rank.

Bosses are not finishable. Guardians share the effects of Elites.

Enemy Ranks are Minor/Elite/Miniboss/Boss.
Range: 10/15/20/25 metres, centered on enemy.
Duration: 5/10/15/20 seconds.
Finisher Duration: 10/15/20/- seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
充能近战击杀和终结技会在敌人周围施加削弱效果（+30% 承受伤害）和致盲效果。
持续时间和范围取决于敌人的等级。

击杀敌方守护者视为精英的效果。首领无法被终结。

敌人的等级分为普通敌人/精英/次级首领/首领。
范围：10/15/20/25 米，以敌人为中心。
持续时间：5/10/15/20 秒。
终结技持续时间：10/15/20/- 秒。

descriptions.en:
Finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 🡅7 seconds.

Buff can be refreshed.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Reduces Incoming <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|35% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

While above 50% Magazine Capacity:
50 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣内子弹量高于 50% 时：
+50 装填速度，装填动画时间缩减为 0.95x。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.
Decreases charge time by 40ms and damage by 2%.
descriptions.es: Reduce en 40ms el tiempo de carga y reduce daño en 2%
descriptions.zh-chs: -40ms 充能时间，-2% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant Melee Ability Energy:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 10%
• Most <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 20%

Kills with Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles only provide 10%.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 35 Handling for 3 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器和 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重武器击杀可获取 10% 近战技能能量。
大多数 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

偃月、追踪步枪、榴弹发射器相较其他特殊武器，仅获得一半能量。

使用近战技能造成伤害获得 +35 操控性，持续 3 秒。将 重新装填 弹匣。

descriptions.en:
<:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Subclass Only.

Replaces Dodge with Shift:
Shift has a travel distance of 10 metres, and renders you completely invisible and invulnerable (except for a trail) for the duration of the shift.

Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
Class Ability Energy does not recharge while Light Shift is active.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] Light Shift grants 10% Increased Damage to Slowed/Frozen Combatants as well as 10% Increased Damage to Arc Weapons. These buffs stack with each other and with all other buffs.

Linearly grants up to 30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, and -17% Accuracy Cone Growth as health decreases below 156 HP.

Effect reaches maximum strength at Critical Health.
descriptions.zh-chs:
生命值低于 156 时：
最高 +30 操控性，-40% 精度锥角尺寸，-17% 精度锥角增长.

当生命值减少时，该效果线性提升，生命值降低到重伤时达到最高值。

descriptions.en:
Receiving damage highlights the enemy that caused it for 8 seconds.

Killing the highlighted enemy grants Vengeance.

Vengeance grants a 95 HP Overshield for 6 seconds.

Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Upon readying the Weapon, for 1 second:
Grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling, and 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.

Buff goes away as soon as ADS input is pressed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拔枪时：
+100 拔枪/收枪操控性，0.95x 拔枪动画系数，持续 1 秒，或直到瞄准。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants more than 29 meters away by 15%|25%|35% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Grants Passive Stat Bonuses depending on your selected Subclass.

Solar: 🡅55 Reload Speed
Arc: 🡅55 Handling
Void: 🡅25 Stability
Stasis: 🡅25 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
Strand: 🡅25 Airborne Effectiveness

🡅 The Subclass Stat Bonuses are increased by 5.
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

火： 🠅+55 填装速度
电： 🠅+55 操控性
虚空： 🠅+25 稳定性
冰影： 🠅+25 后座方向，降低 5% 瞄准时移动速度惩罚

🠅 相应属性额外 +5。

descriptions.en:
After having dealt or received damage every 3 seconds for 6 seconds:
30 Airborne Effectiveness and [?]% Flinch Resistance.

Deactivates when no damage is dealt or received in the last 3 seconds.

🡅 Time until the perk deactivates is extended.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Passively Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5%] Damage Resist to Guardians inside your Rift.
Works while inside a Well of Radiance if you cast a Rift inside it.

Upon reaching Critical Health:
Dearly Departed grants <:pve:922884406073507930>55% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[27.5%] Class Ability Energy.
Buff lasts until you are no longer at Critical Health, essentially serving as a Cooldown.

On Death:
Spawns a Healing Rift for 15 seconds.
Decreases Hipfire Accuracy Cone Size by 15% and grants a 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier.
Using a Noble Round on an ally heals them and grants both you and them a weapon damage bonus for a short duration.
Weapon Kills restore 7 HP.
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器最后一击恢复 7 生命值。

descriptions.en:
Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
投掷手雷或使用充能近战击中目标可获得 1 层全面发展增益，使用超能可获得 2 层增益。

每层增益 +10 射程，+10 稳定性，+10 操控性。
最高叠加 2 层，持续 15 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants 40ms Lower Charge Time. Does not reduce damage.
Does not display in the stats.
descriptions.zh-chs:
-40ms 充能时间
不会降低伤害。
不会显示在武器属性中。

descriptions.en: Blighted targets take damage over time and blight the nearby area on death.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

Weapon Hits grant Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

Incandescent Scorch ticks, Chain Reaction and Dragonfly elemental explosions, and Voltshot jolt chains(?) count as hits.

Ability Energy gains per weapon:
• Posterity, Trustee: 0.3%
• Heritage: 0.65%
• Succession, Bequest, Commemoration: unknown
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

On Weapon Kill against an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
Grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 8 seconds.

Weaken effects other than the one provided by Divinity can also activate it.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器击杀受虚空负面效果影响的敌人时：
获得一个 虚空覆盖护盾 ，持续 8 秒。

大多数“虚弱”效果都可以触发该特性（神性除外）.

descriptions.en: The Void rocket suppresses enemies. The Solar rocket causes damage over time.

On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes your Weapon Element to match the selected Subclass until stowed.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Handling.

🡅42% Increased Damage.

Swords only receive a 🡅36.75% Damage Increase

Lingers for 1.5 seconds.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased by 5%. (e.g. 40% » 42%)

Increases Melee Damage for 1.22 seconds after hiting a target with 10 of the 12 Shotgun Pellets.

Melee Damage Increases:
• 100% Increased Unpowered Melee Damage
• 40% Increased Powered Melee Damage

🡅 Requires 2 fewer Shotgun Pellets to activate.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/Drain nearby combatants

Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

In alternative firing mode, hold the trigger to charge up and fire more powerful linear fusion shots.
Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

67% Increased damage for Grounded Heavy Attack.
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你的重攻击消耗掉的是你的最后一发弹药：
+67% 地面伤害.

descriptions.en:
Upon sprinting for 0.5 seconds with a Shoulder Charge (or Ballistic Slam) Melee Ability charge:
Slowly grants 75 HP Overshield over 3 seconds after sprinting for 0.5 seconds. Overshield is instantly removed if no longer sprinting.

Grants 50% Melee Ability Energy upon dealing damage with the mentioned Melee Abilities.

在满生命值的情况下装备肩撞类近战且充能完毕时：

冲刺后 0.5 秒开始，在 3 秒内逐渐获得 75 生命值的覆盖护盾。

肩撞技能击中敌人后回复 50% 的近战充能。

有效的近战技能包括地震打击、弹道猛击、战锤打击、圣盾强袭。

Scoring 4 Precision Hits refunds 2 Ammo to Magazine.

Precision Hit counter is reset if no Precision Hits are scored within 🡅3 seconds.

🡅 Allowed time between Precision Hits is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 🡅85 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills.

Activation Progress by Enemy Rank:
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.

🡅 Heals for an additional 5 HP.

Dodging Grants x1 Stat Boost to you and allies within 15 meters for 15 seconds.

While Stat Boost is active:
• Kills or Dodges grant an additional Stack (maximum of 5) and refresh the duration of the buff.
• Allies within 10 meters receive the same stack amount of Stat Boost as the owner when the buff is refreshed.

Stat Boost Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 30 | 35 | 40 | 45 | 50 Airborne Effectiveness
• 40(?) | 40(?) | 45(?) | 50(?) | 55(?) Handling
• 40 | 40 | 45 | 50 | 55 Reload Speed
• 1x | 0.925x | 0.915x | 0.91x | 0.89x Reload Duration Multiplier

After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each: 35% Increased Damage for 🡅11 seconds.

Buff can't be refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Remaining invisible grants this weapon increased damage for a brief duration.

Hitting a target with this weapon's projectiles while Shot in the Dark is active weakens them.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to Weapons matching your Subclass Element and the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.
Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.
Grants an extra Grenade Ability Charge.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次手雷技能充能。
手雷技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

While Sprinting:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>100% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
• <:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate is doubled.
• <:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 100% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.

On Class Ability Usage:
Grants 6.25% Faster Sprint Speed for 10 seconds. Duration is not refreshable.

(Multiplicative Ability Regeneration Rate Increase in PVE is applied after all Aditive Ability Regeneration Rate Increases/Decreases)
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺时：
• [PVE] 手雷和近战技能的充能速度翻倍。
• [PVP] 100% 额外的基础手雷/近战再生速度。
• 100% [PVP：200%] 额外的基础职业技能充能速度。

闪身时：
+6.25% 奔跑速度，持续10秒。
持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a Kinetic Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Lumina.

Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seek out allies within 35 meters and apply a buff:
• Healing Rift Seeker: restores 75 HP and starts Health Regeneration
• Empowering Rift Seeker: <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] Increased Damage for 5 seconds

Amount of Noble Seekers spawned is equal to [Fireteam Size]-1, with a minimum of 1 Seeker.

Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift Duration gets extended by 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
为流明被动提升 +30 空中效率。

站在裂缝中每 5 秒会产生一个寻找盟友的高贵追踪弹，在35米范围内寻找盟友，并根据你站立的裂隙的类型给他们施加一个增益效果。
产生的高贵追踪弹数量等于队伍人数减 1，最低为 1 个。

每当一个高贵追踪弹施加一个增益效果，裂隙的持续时间延长 5 秒。

治疗裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供 75 点生命值，并开始恢复生命值。
强能裂隙产生的追踪弹为友军提供持续 5 秒的 <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] 伤害增益。

descriptions.en:
While Crouched:
• Prevents Radar Ping when shooting
• [?] Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
• Increases Arrow Hold Time by 25%
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
防止蹲伏射击时产生雷达信号。
[+?] 填装速度，0.8x 装填动画系数，提升保持拉弓最长时间 25%。

descriptions.en:
On Barricade Cast:
Drengr's Lash creates 2 additional Lashes with seeking capabilities that travel up to [?] metres.

Upon applying Suspension:
Grants Woven Mail for 10 seconds.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
Fires a single-slug round. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Ability Charge.

Coldsnaps Grenades have better tracking, travel 35% further, and grant Grenade Ability upon hitting or freezing an enemy.

Grenade Ability Energy gains based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant):

• 10%: Tier 1 Minors
• 22%: Tier 2 Minors, Tier 1 Elites
• 34%: Tier 3 Minors, Tier 2 Elites
• 50%: Tier 4 Minors, Tier 3-4 Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn while on a Solar Subclass.

Tome of Dawn lasts 2.8 seconds and holds you in place midair. Weapon hits add [?] seconds to its duration.

Tome of Dawn grants the following:
• 50 Airborn Effectiveness
• 25% Flinch Resistance
• 15% Damage Resistance

Grants an extra Fusion Grenade Charge.

Grants 20% Grenade Energy on Empowered Weapon Hits with a 0.4 second cooldown.
Weapon Damage is 'Empowered' while in a Well of Radiance or an Empowering Rift.

Grants 100% Class Ability Energy on Grenade Kills.

Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.

Resolute is a 75 HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
施放浩劫之拳时获得一道力场护盾。

力场护盾为一个 75 生命值，可以抵消精准伤害的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming AoE Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25%|35% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.
When Personal Assistant is active, this weapon has better target acquisition and deals significantly more precision damage.

descriptions.zh-chs: +15 空中效率。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants:
• 35% Increased Projectile Velocity
• 10 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升：
• +35% 弹头速度
• +10 填装速度，0.8x 填装动画系数

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

descriptions.zh-chs:
主武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.5x。
特殊武器瞄准动画系数调整为 0.75x。

descriptions.en:
While within 15 meters of 3 enemies:
[?]% Increased Blast Radius and 40% Reduced Self Damage.

Lingers for 4 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 3 个敌人时：
增加 [?]% 爆炸范围，降低 40% 自身伤害。
（自身伤害的伤害量通常会提升 25%。）

线性持续 4(?) 秒。

Spawns an Orb of Power on Grenade Kills. 1 second cooldown between activations.

<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 20%

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants with precision damage will unlock this objective faster.

Defeating combatants in the Shattered Realm and Astral Alignment grants bonus progress.

When at or below 110 HP:
• 50 Handling
• 0.95x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier
• Refills magazine from reserves

Works while stowed.

低于 110 生命值时：
+50 操控性，0.9 拔枪/收枪动画系数，并且重新填装武器。

武器收起时也有效。

20 Aim Assist, -20% Accuracy Cone Size, and [?] ADS Handling for 5 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

0.85x Charge/Draw Time Multiplier.

25% Increased damage for 5 seconds.

增益持续时间无法被再次换单而刷新。武器收起时保持生效。

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.
Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

-3.75% 弹头散布。
-[?]% 精准伤害系数。

Hits against Non-Matching or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage Increase:
• Fusion Rifles: 29% per hit, up to 435%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 33.3% per hit, up to 500%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 150% per hit, up to 450%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 166.6% per hit, up to 500%
descriptions.es:
Luego de impactar con un Escudo de otro elemento al arma, o la Barrera de un Campeon:
Los proximos impactos aumentan en daño contra el escudo del enemigo.

El bufo se termina si se impacta contra un escudo con mismo elemento, o contra un enemigo sin escudo.

+29% por bala, hasta 435%: Fusil de Fusion

+33.3% por bala, hasta 500%:
Fusiles Automaticos, Fusiles de Pulsos, Fusiles de Rastreo y Ametralladoras

+150% por bala, hasta 450%: Fusiles de Fusion Lineales

+166.6% por bala, hasta 500%;
Arcos, Gujas, Cañones de Mano y Fusiles de Explorador

Mejorado: El daño aumentado por bala aumenta, y el maximo daño aumenta un 20%
Por ejemplo: 500% -> 600%

当命中与武器元素不匹配的护盾，或屏障勇士护盾时：
每次命中都会逐渐提升对护盾的伤害。

当命中与武器元素匹配的元素护盾，或没有护盾的敌人时，移除伤害增益。

融合步枪：每次命中提升 29%，最高 435%

自动步枪、脉冲步枪、追踪步枪、机枪：每次命中提升 33.3%，最高 500%

线性融合步枪：每次命中提升 150%，最高 450%

弓箭、偃月、手炮、斥候步枪：每次命中提升 166.6%，最高 500%

descriptions.en: Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.
Fully charging the laser refills the magazine from reserves.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

While within 15 meters of 3 enemies:
[?]% Increased Blast Radius and 40% Reduced Self Damage.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Blast Radius.

Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to Kinetic Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>Ability Energy gains are halved in PVP.

3 Enemies = 250%

<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

descriptions.zh-chs:
被 3 名以上敌人包围时：激活生物强化

生物强化在 8 秒内提高近战和常能伤害。

50% 超能伤害。
PVE：提高 200% 近战伤害。
PVP：提高 100% 近战伤害。

扩大近战前冲范围到 7 米。

Melee Hits grant a stack of Fury Conductors.
Taking Melee Damage releases an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Explosion that deals 40 damage in a 5 metre radius.

Fury Conductors grant Melee Damage Resist and increased <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Explosion damage based on the amount of stacks.
33%   | 55%   | 70%   Melee Damage Resist
100% | 200% | 300% Increased <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Explosion Damage

All Stacks disappear upon taking melee damage or after 10 seconds of not dealing melee damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战命中可获得的“狂怒导体能量”层数。
被近战命中会释放一个 5 米范围的<:arc:720178925317128243>电弧爆炸，造成 40 伤害。

“狂怒导体能量”提供近战伤害抗性，并提升电弧爆炸的伤害量，根据叠加层数增多。
33%   | 55%   | 70%   近战伤害抗性
100% | 200% | 300% 提升<:arc:720178925317128243>电弧爆炸伤害

受到近战伤害后，或 10 秒内未造成近战伤害，“狂怒导体能量”的层数将被移除。

Powered Void Melee Kills grant <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Super Energy once per usage.

Sentinel Shield's Shield Throw Hits regenerate 10% Super Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用虚空近战技能击杀敌人会获得 <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] 超能能量，每次使用只能获得一次。

哨兵圣盾的圣盾投掷命中时，会回复 10% 超能能量。

6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% Increased Damage.

Buff is refreshed on Weapon or Melee Kills. Melee Kills grant all 5 stacks.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

当职业技能充能完毕时受到重伤，或释放屏障时：
在你脚下生成一个太阳黑子。

仅在烈焰分支生效。

70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Reload Duration Multiplier for 6 seconds.

+70 填装速度，0.9x 填装动画系数，持续 6 秒。

10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per stack for 🡅8.5 seconds.

Grants 1% Class Ability Energy for every point of damage blocked.

Blocking Melee Damage grants 50% more Class Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡伤害时：
根据伤害量获取职业技能能量。

可获取大量能量。

descriptions.en:
Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gain with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

Upon Sliding:
• Refills 15% of the Magazine
• 20 Stability and 20 Handling for 3 seconds
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 稳定性，+20 操控性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill:
Enemy explodes, applying Volatile in a 6.5 meter radius.

[?] second cooldown after activation.
Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.

1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Upon readying a sword, for 1 second:
80% Increased Grounded and 64% Increased Airborne Lunge Distance.

Deactivates after swinging once. 3 second cooldown.
descriptions.zh-chs:
切换到此武器时：
提升 100% 刀剑前冲距离，持续 1 秒。

移动速度过快时将立即结束该效果。

冷却时间 4 秒。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.
High damage, high recoil.

Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Grants 10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Void Invisibility effects last 2 seconds longer.

While Invisible:
• <:pve:922884406073507930>400% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] Additional Base Melee Regeneration Rate.
• Enemies within 15 metres will increase the bonus to a total of <:pve:922884406073507930>600% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] and <:pve:922884406073507930>800% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[300%].

+100 Recovery
+100 Reload Speed

Scoring **a lot of** Weapon Hits grants a Stack of Field Test. Maximum of 5 stacks.

Stat Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 2|5|8|14|20 Range
• 5|10|20|35|55 Reload Speed
• [?] Stability and Handling
• [?] Charge Rate, Guard Resistance (Swords)
Buff is only removed on death.

Hits required for 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 51 | 151 | 351 | 651 | 1001
<:special:968793055631114330>Special, <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: unknown

<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapon Kills count as <:pve:922884406073507930>6(?) <:pvp:922884468275019856>[51] Hits.
<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapon Kills count as (?) Hits.
Bonus damage against Taken enemies and Gambit invaders.

Grenade Ability usage and Powered Melee hits grant 1 Stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability usage grants 2 Stacks.

Grants 10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack for 15 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.


🡅 Stronger effect.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.

Scoring multiple hits lowers the target's damage output by 10% for <:pve:922884406073507930>5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

Duration cannot be refreshed.

Upon readying the weapon within 3.5 seconds of getting kills with other weapons while it was stowed:
10 Handling, 10 Reload Speed, and 10 Stability per stack for 7.5 seconds.

Maximum of 3 Stacks. Buff is removed on stow.
descriptions.zh-chs:
此武器收起时使用武器或技能完成最后一击，并在 3.5 秒内拔出此武器：
每层增益 +10 操控性，+10 填装速度，+10 稳定性，持续 7.5 秒。

最多叠加 3 层。收枪时移除该增益。

descriptions.en:
Upon finishing a reload within 3.8 seconds of a Kill:
The next Weapon Hit within 7 seconds applies Jolt.

Damage from Jolt inherits the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097) but is only applied to the Jolted target.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 3 秒内进行填装：
7 秒内的下一次武器命中会震颤敌人。

此次震颤的伤害量可以通过其他增益效果提升。

descriptions.en: Allies within 18 meters receive 1 Armor Charge on Orb of Power Pickup.

Proximity Explosive Knife applies 60 Scorch on detonation. (Unaffected by Ember of Ashes)
Proximity Explosive Knife kills cause an ignition.

Grants 500% Additional Base Melee Recharge Rate while Proximity Knife remains unexploded.
descriptions.zh-chs:
感应飞刀在爆炸时施加 60 层灼烧。
如果使用感应飞刀直接击中击杀敌人，则会触发点燃效果。

感应飞刀未爆炸时，近战技能基础冷却速度增加 500%。

descriptions.en:
While in Spectral Blades:
Refunds Super Energy on Heavy Attack based on the number of Spectral Blade Kills.

Super Energy Refund after 1|2|3|4|5+ kills:
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 11.1% | 14.3% | 16.5% | 16.9% | 17.1%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 8.3% | 12.5% | 14.2% | 15.8% | 16.7%
descriptions.zh-chs:
在超能鬼灵利刃期间：
根据重攻击的击杀数量，恢复超能能量。

基于击杀数量的超能能量增长（%）
PVE: 11.1 🠚 14.3 🠚 16.5 🠚 16.9 🠚 17.1
PVP: 8.3 🠚 12.5 🠚 14.2 🠚 15.8 🠚 16.7

descriptions.en: Grants an extra Class Ability Charge.
Immediately Starts Health Regeneration on Orb of Power Pickups.
Grants 1 Armor Charges to Allies within 21 meters on Super Cast. Allies on a different Subclass Element are granted 2 Charges.

On Kinetic Damage Precision Kill:
Enemy explodes in an elemental explosion that matches your currently selected Subclass, dealing up to 208 damage.

Explosion Radius and Falloff Distance slightly scale with your Weapon's Range Stat.
descriptions.zh-chs:
动能武器取得精准最后一击时：
敌人释放出与当前所选职业相匹配的元素爆炸，造成最多 <:pve:922884406073507930>210 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[200] 伤害。

爆炸半径和衰减距离会根据武器的射程属性有细微的改变。

descriptions.en:
Grants Super Energy on kills while inside your Well of Radiance and below 50% Super Energy.

Amount of Super Energy gained is reduced by 1.5% for each successive kill, down to a minimum of 4% Super Energy per kill:
10% -> 8.5% -> 7% -> 5% -> 4.5% -> 4% -> 4%...

Upon breaking a Combatant's Elemental Shield or a Guardian's Shield while in Super:
Grants a 30 HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员或正在使用超能的守护者的护盾时：
获得一个持续 10 秒，30 生命值的覆盖护盾。

descriptions.en:
As Magazine goes below 50%, until empty:
<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 12.1% to 25.6% Increased damage.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 3% to 6% Increased damage.

Activation is based on the Base Magazine Capacity so it's unaffected by overflowing effects.
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

Passively Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

On Elemental, Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Weakens the enemy, increasing Kinetic Damage dealt by 50% for 5.5 seconds.

Stacks with all other Debuffs as it is a Weapon Perk.

🡅 Debuff Duration is increased.

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100(?) Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.

🡅 Stronger effect.

Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 4 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月格挡伤害后：
+20% 弹头伤害，持续 4 秒，或直到停止格挡。

格挡任意伤害可刷新持续时间。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Kills with Drang reload this weapon and overflow a bonus damage round into the magazine.

30% Increased Glaive Melee Damage for 🡅11 seconds upon scoring a Glaive Projectile Kill.

Dealing Projectile or Melee Damage extends the buff duration by 5 seconds, up to 10 seconds.

Persists through stow.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Suppresses and weakens the enemy, making them receive 20% increased damage for 4 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
格挡后 0.5 秒内受到近战伤害：
抑制并虚弱该名敌人，使他受到额外 20% 伤害，持续 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants a 200(?) HP Overshield for the duration of your Finisher Animation.

Finishers grant 60% Damage Resistance by default so this is the equivalent of a 500(?) HP Overshield.

Increases <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

If no allies are within 15 meters:
• 2.5% Reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
• 0.85x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内没有盟友的情况下瞄准：
-2.5% 移动速度惩罚
[0.85x?] 瞄准动画系数

descriptions.en:
On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to Strand Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain an additional perk.

Heal allies with Noble Rounds to unlock this upgrade.

30 Airborne Effectiveness and [?]% Flinch Resistance.

Deactivates when no damage is dealt or received in the last 3 seconds.

Crouch Speed is set to 4 meters per second and you gain doubled radar resolution while crouched.
Ignores slows, identically to Transversives Steps.

Suppressing an enemy grants +30 Mobility and 4% Forward Movement Speed Bonus. for 10 seconds and refreshes your readied weapon.
Buff duration serves as cooldown.
Void Ability Kills cause enemies to explode. dealing up to ? [130] damage in a 7 metre radius.

Melee Kills grant Grenade Energy based on Enemy Rank.
8% = Tier 1 Rank-And-File
14% = Tier 2 Rank-And-File | Tier 1 Elite | Guardians
18% = Tier 3 Rank-And-File | Tier 2 Elite
26% = Tier 3 Elite | Minibosses | Bosses

Picking up an Orb of Power grants 1 Stack of Explosive Light. Maximum of 🡅7 Stacks.

Consumes 1 Stack per Shot, granting 100 Blast Radius, [?]% larger explosion radius, and Increased Damage.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased Impact and Explosive Damage.

Grenade Launchers: Increases total damage by 52%.

🡅 Maximum number of Stacks is increased by 1.

Increases <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Randomly grants 10% to 50% Increased Magazine Capacity upon reloading.

Always rounds up.

装填时：
随机过量装填弹匣容量 10% ~ 50% 的弹药。
数值向上取整。

descriptions.en: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.

Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to Kinetic Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Wave deals <:pve:922884406073507930>240 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100] damage.

<:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Kills refresh 25% of Class Ability Energy.

After dealing non-projectile Melee Damage:
50% Increased damage, [+?] Reload Speed, and +30 Handling for 5 seconds OR 3 shots.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating high-tier Wrathborn with any weapon or ability will unlock this objective significantly faster.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a protective shield on impact.
Kills with this weapon heal the wielder. Precision kills also refill the magazine.

On Weapon Hits, for 1 second:
• Reduces Weapon Recoil by ?%
• Grants ?% Flinch Resistance
• Reduces Visual Weapon Shake
• Removes Reticle Bounce

Stacks 5 times. Additional hits refresh the duration.

Stacks gained per Weapon Hit:

descriptions.zh-chs:
连续命中时：
降低最大后坐力角度、武器晃动。
最高叠加 5 层，持续 1 秒。

使用手柄时移除准星抖动。

20% increased damage for 🡅12 seconds.

Hard-hitting four-burst fire.
