4 second cooldown after buff expires. Can be activated while stowed.

Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate the perk.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

On Weapon Kill against an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
Grants a 45 HP Void Overshield for 🡅10 seconds.

Weaken effects other than the one provided by Divinity can also activate it.

🡅 Overshield Duration is increased by 2 seconds.

After 1.5 seconds of aiming-down-sights without firing, for one shot:
• 10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance
• Increases Precision Multiplier by 1

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed.

The precision damage of Scout Rifles is decreased by 5% while Box Breathing is active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
未射击下瞄准 1.5 秒：
+10% 瞄准辅助衰减距离，并提高下一发子弹精准命中伤害（伤害系数+1）。
按下瞄准键即开始计时。

伤害提升值：
斥候步枪：+62.75% (1.6x -> 2.6x)
狙击步枪：+33.22% (3x -> 4x)
线性融合步枪：+29% (3.44x -> 4.44x)

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming Damage from PVE Combatants less than 4 meters away by 15%|25%|35% with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
17% | 33% | 50% Increased damage for 🡅5.5 seconds, depending on the amount of enemies killed within [?] seconds of each.

Each kill within the time period contributes to 1 Stack of the buff. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

Buff is overwritten every time it is refreshed.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the Maximum Number of Armor Charge Stacks you can hold from 3 to 4|5|6 with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to Kinetic Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Weapon Kills grant 2 Stacks of Shot Swap, granting 100(?) Ready/Stow Handling.

Maximum of 8 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack when readying or stowing the weapon.
Swords are refunded 1 Ammo after every other Powered Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs: 每隔一次的赋能刀剑击杀提供 1 发刀剑弹药。

descriptions.en:
Spawns a <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick upon scoring a Weapon Kill after reaching 100% Counter Progress. Counter is only progressed by Weapon Kills.

Counter Progress on Weapon Kills:
1.66% to 1.8%. Average of 57.25 Kills.

Progress Multiplier on Kills by Weapon Type:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 3.25x
• Exotic <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 4.75x
• <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 1.1x

Ammo Finder Bricks grant 33%|66%|100% of a Regular Ammo Brick's Pickup Amount with 1|2|3 Mods equipped. Pickup Amount is determined on Brick Spawn.

Increases Damage by 15% for 7 seconds on Weapon Kills.

Matching Grenade and Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% Damage Buff can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+15% 伤害，持续 7 秒。

此增益生效期间，相同伤害类型的手雷或近战击杀会 +50% 伤害，并延长持续时间 10 秒。
持续时间仅可被另一种技能击杀刷新。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant a buff, depending on whether your Super Ability is charged or not.

If Super is not Full:
Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
Energy Siphon grants <:pve:922884406073507930>3% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[+1.45%] Super Energy.

If Super is Full:
Grants Absorption Cells, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] increased damage for Weapons Matching your Subclass Element for <:pve:922884406073507930>6 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3.5] seconds. Additional Kills increase duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] seconds.
Absorption Cells maxes out at a <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[6] second duration.

Absorption Cells disappears on Weapon Swap.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

Grants 30 Handling and 40 Reload Speed while within 15 meters of an ally.

Lingers for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米范围内有 1 个以上敌人时：
+30 操控性，+40 填装速度。

线性持续 1.5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
Grants an extra Melee Ability Charge.
descriptions.zh-chs:
获得额外一次近战技能充能。
近战技能数量上限为 2。

descriptions.en: Thrown Grenades travel 25% faster.

On Weapon Kill, for 6 seconds:
37.5% Decreased Charge/Draw Time.

Kills while the perk active add 4 seconds to the duration up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
+37.5% 充能/拉弓速度，持续 6 秒。

增益触发时完成击杀，增加 4 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5  | 15 | 25 Stability
• 5  | 25 | 50 Reload Speed
• 10 | 25 | 50 Handling

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Grenade Kills grant Volatile Rounds to your Void Weapons for 10 seconds.
Volatile Rounds makes any hit with a Void Weapon apply Volatile.

Precision Kills on weakened enemies creates an Orb of Power.
10 second cooldown after creating an Orb of Power.
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

Passively grants 20 Airborne Effectiveness.

Moving your reticle near enemies for 1 second marks them for 5 seconds. Mark is visible through walls.

If Enemy is below 30% HP:
Grants 1% increased Weapon and Ability Damage for every percentage point below 30%.
(10% HP left >> 20% Increased Damage)
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提供 +20 空中效率。

准星悬停在敌人附近 1 秒后，标记敌人 5 秒。
标记穿墙可见。

如果敌人血量低于 30%：
提供低于 30% 对应百分数的伤害提高。
（例如：剩 10% 的血量 -> 伤害增加 20%）

伤害提高适用于所有造成的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Modified Golden Gun deals 500% Increased Damage but can only fire once per activation.
(37% more Damage compared to 3 Precision Hits with Marksman Golden Gun)

Scoring a Golden Gun Kill refunds 33% Super Energy and causes the enemy to explode.
descriptions.zh-chs:
黄金枪每次激活只能开一枪。

黄金枪造成 500% 额外伤害。
（比使用射手黄金枪精确命中 3 次造成的伤害高 37%）。

击杀敌人时返还 33% 的超能能量。

descriptions.en:
Radar remains active while Aiming Down Sights.

Crouching Grants Enhanced Radar.
(Has 12 sections instead of 6)
Superb handling. Move faster with this lightweight weapon equipped. This weapon grants additional speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

On Weapon Kill:
Applies 30 Scorch to enemies within 4(?) meters.

Ember of Ashes increases this to 🡅<:pve:922884406073507930>45 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[40] Scorch.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

Damage from Scorch can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs and Debuffs.

🡅 Applies to 5 more Scorch Stacks to PvE Combatants when Ember of Ashes is equipped.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 🡅9% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.

🡅 Ability Energy Gain is increased by 12.5%. (8%🠚9%)

Increases Melee Damage for 1.22 seconds after hiting a target with all 12 Shotgun Pellets.

Melee Damage Increases:
• 100% Increased Unpowered Melee Damage
• 40% Increased Powered Melee Damage
descriptions.zh-chs:
当一发弹药的 12 枚弹片全部命中时：
在 1.22 秒内增加近战伤害。

未充能近战：+100% 伤害。
充能近战：+40% 伤害。

对首领和载具时，再增加 25% 伤害。和上述增伤乘法叠加。

descriptions.en:
Upon Picking Up <:special:968793055631114330> Special or <:heavy:968793055652106320> Heavy Ammo:
Magazine gets overflowed to 🡅205-222% of its regular capacity from reserves.

Activates even if stowed.

🡅 Overflow amount is increased by 5-22%.

Hybrid melee/ranged polearm with a frontal shield.
Generates energy on dealing ranged damage.

[Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield, depleting energy over time
[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo

While Aiming Down Sights:
10 Aim Assist, and 2.5% Reduced Aiming-Down-Sights Movement Speed Penalty.

🡅 Aim Assist bonus is slightly increased.

Passively Grants the following to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

<:primary:968793055677251604> Primary and <:heavy:968793055652106320> Power Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.

<:special:968793055631114330> Special Weapon Kills grant an additional <:pve:922884406073507930>1.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1%] Super Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器 或 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 威能武器击杀提供额外 1%  超能充能。
<:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器击杀提供额外 1.5% 超能充能。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 武器击杀提供额外 1% 超能充能。

descriptions.en:
Grants a Stack of Warlord's Sigil on (Glaive) Melee Kills for 5 seconds, increasing (Glaive) Melee Damage.

(Glaive) Melee Damage Increase at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%
descriptions.zh-chs:
近战击杀后获得“督军印记”：
“督军印记”持续 5 秒，提供额外近战伤害，可叠加 5 层。

额外近战伤害：
55% | 110% | 165% | 220% | 275%

descriptions.en:
On Melee Kill:
• Restores 50 HP
• Heals for 30 HP per second for 8 seconds

Buff duration can be refreshed.

The Solar-Element Grenades named "Solar Grenades" have Fastball intrinsically and last twice as long (4 -> 8 seconds).

Powered Melee Kills grant 5 seconds of Sunbracers Ready.

Using your Grenade Ability while Sunbracers Ready is active grants Sunbracers buff, granting unlimited Solar Grenades for 5 seconds.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

On Weapon Kill, for 🡅6.5 seconds:
-15% Accuracy Cone Growth, 15 Stability, and 20 Recoil Direction per stack.

Maximum of 2 Stacks. Duration is refreshed on kills.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon readying the weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:
20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 🡅8 seconds.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.
High damage, high recoil. Optimized for long-distance shooting.

Grants 30|50|60 Strength with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with with a <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack of Feeding Frenzy for 3.5 seconds, increasing the Reload Speed of the weapon. Maximum of 5 Stacks.

Bonuses at 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
• 8 | 50 | 60 | 75 | 100 Reload Speed Stat
• 0.975x | 0.9x | 0.868x | 0.837x | 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
提高装填速度，持续 3.5 秒，最高叠加 5 层。

10 | 45 | 55 | 70 | 100 装填速度。
- | 0.9x | 0.875x | 0.85x | 0.8x 填装动画系数。

descriptions.en: Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against Bosses and Vehicles.
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:void:720178940240461864>Void Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants the following to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.
Tapping the trigger gives this weapon less recoil and improves accuracy.

Daybreak Projectiles apply 30 Scorch on hit. (40 with Ember of Ashes Equipped)
Daybreak Projectiles can occasionally hit twice - doubling the amount of Scorch applied.

Scorch effects deal <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] increased damage.

Scorch Damage ticks grant 6.25% Melee Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
黎明射弹命中时会造成 60 层灼烧。
如果装备了骨灰余烬，会提升到 90 层。

灼烧会对敌人造成 <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[50%] 额外伤害。

当灼烧造成伤害时，会获得 [?] 近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns 2 Threadlings upon destroying a Tangle.

Threadlings apply Unravel for <:pve:922884406073507930>[?] <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5] seconds on hit. This is increased to <:pve:922884406073507930>[?] <:pvp:922884468275019856>[7.5] seconds with Thread of Continuity equipped.

1 second after stowing <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Melee Hits refill the magazine of your equipped weapon from reserves and grant 50 Airborne Effectiveness for 5 seconds.

7 second cooldown between activations.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon. Melee kills grant ammo for this weapon.

On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.

Holding [Grenade] summons a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds and makes you Amplified.

Sentient Arc Soul grants 4.5% Grenade Energy once per burst if it damages an enemy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
按住[手雷]键召唤一个有电弧之魂，持续 20 秒，并使你进入增幅状态。

电弧之魂每次连射如果对敌人造成，会提供 4.5% 的手雷能量。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
This weapon has a well-rounded adaptive grip, reliable and sturdy. Kills with this weapon reload Sturm and overflow a bonus damage round into it.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar or Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

The upper 50% of the Magazine has up to 20 Stability and 30 Reload Speed.

The benefits decrease linearly as the Magazine approaches 50% capacity.
descriptions.zh-chs: 此武器的前半弹匣弹药获得 +20 稳定性，+30 填装速度。

descriptions.en:
After Shooting an Ammo Brick:
Picks up Ammo and refills all Weapons from reserves.

Triggers Ammo Pickup effects. Only activates if picking up ammo is possible.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Range.

While Aiming Down Sights:
10% Increased Effective Zoom and 5% Faster Projectile Speed.

The Effective Zoom increase pushes out the Damage and Aim Assist Falloff by 10% and narrows the Accuracy and Aim Assist Cones.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准时：
+10% 有效焦距（作用于有效射程、瞄准辅助距离），+5% 弹头速度。

descriptions.en:
On Precision Kill:
Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>123.89 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[95.3] damage that matches the Element of the weapon over a 3 meter radius.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 65 点与武器元素类型相同的伤害。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员阶级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
While Guarding with a Sword:
Grants 1% Class Ability Energy for every point of damage blocked.

Blocking Melee Damage grants 50% more Class Ability Energy.

🡅 Increased Class Ability Energy Gain.

Upon Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
Suppresses and weakens the enemy, making them receive 20% increased damage for 4 seconds.

🡅 Passively grants 10 Ammo Capacity.

Grants 35% Flinch Reduction after 1 second of Aiming Down Sights (ADS) without firing.

Timer starts as soon as the ADS input is pressed. The perk remains active while ADS.
descriptions.zh-chs:
瞄准 1 秒后不射击：
-35% 后仰抖动，直到取消瞄准。

按下瞄准键即开始计时。

descriptions.en:
While Crouched:
+50 Reload Speed, 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier, and 0.8x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier.

Passively grants 30 Inventory Size Stat. (5 less than 2 Reserve Armor Mods)
descriptions.zh-chs:
蹲下时：
+50 装填速度， 0.8x 填装动画系数， 0.8x 拔枪/收枪动画系数

被动提升备弹容量。

descriptions.en: Hard-hitting four-burst fire.

Passively Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Linearly increases Explosive Damage after 0.2 seconds of the grenade being in flight.

Reaches the maximum 25% Explosive Damage Increase after 1.1 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
距目标 10 米范围外时，每米增加 0.63% 爆炸伤害。

50 米时增加 25% 爆炸伤害。

对属性为 50 爆炸范围的威能榴弹发射器，总计增加 17% 的伤害。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill for 🡅8 seconds:
• 30% Increased Damage
• 20% Longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% Damage Increase.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
+30% 伤害
-20% 射速/充能效率
+10 射程

弓箭和霰弹枪仅 +20% 伤害。

🠅 增益持续时间增加到 8 秒。

descriptions.en:
During Winter's Wrath Super:
Shockwave (Heavy Attack) deals 100% increased Shatter Damage.

Allies within range of the Shockwave (30 meters) are granted the following for 15 seconds:
• 50 HP Stasis Shard Overshield
• <:pve:922884406073507930>15% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5%] Increased Stasis Weapon Damage

Buff is non-refreshable and can proc on self once Super runs out. Damage Buff stacks with everything.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upon scoring 50% of Magazine as Precision Hits:
20% increased damage for 11 seconds.

Duration can be refreshed by scoring enough precision hits.

Stowing or reloading resets the precision counter but the buff persists through stowing if active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
弹匣的一半弹药造成精准伤害后：
+20% 伤害，持续 11 秒。

达到足够精确命中数后可刷新持续时间。

收枪或装填将重置精确命中计数。该特性触发后，收枪也会维持武器的增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Weapon Kills grant a stacking Damage Buff until stowing or reloading the weapon.

Maximum of 3 stacks.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 10% | 20% | 30% increased damage
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 5% | 10% | 15% increased damage

🡅 Passively grants 10 Magazine Stat. (Identical to Tactical Mag)

Passively grants 🡅12 Airborne Effectiveness.

Grants 🡅35 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.

🡅 Grants 2 more Airborne Effectiveness passively and 5 more per Stack.
Projectiles will detonate when they are within close proximity of their targets.
Absorbing a Remnant strengthens Mark of the Devourer and partially refills the magazine.

Increases <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon finishing a reload within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
25% Increased damage for 🡅5.5 seconds.

Buff can be refreshed through additional reloads. Persists through stow.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

Grants 1 Stack of Rapid Hit per Precision Hit, improving Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds.

• 2 | 12 | 14 | 18 | 25 Stability
• 5 | 30 | 35 | 42 | 60 Reload Speed
• 0.99x | 0.96x | 0.95x | 0.945x | 0.92x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Stronger Effect.

Hits within 0.2 seconds of each grant a scaling Damage Buff after scoring 12.5% of the Magazine Capacity as hits.

Stacks displayed on-screen are only visual aides, the [scaling is continuous](https://i.ibb.co/KbxNKvj/Target-Lock-Explanation.png).
Reaches maximum strength at 5 Stacks.

Damage buff when reaching 1|2|3|4|5 Stacks:
🡅18.82% | 🡅26.4% | 🡅32.94% | 🡅39.07% | 🡅45%

% of the Magazine as Hits required for each Stack:
12.5% | 35.5% | 54.5% | 74.5% | 110.5%

Assuming no missed shots, it provides a 🡅~28.13% Damage Buff on average after firing 100% of the Magazine.

🡅 Damage Buff is increased by 12.5%. (e.g. 40% » 45%)

Upon Reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
20 Aim Assist, -20% Accuracy Cone Size, and [?] ADS Handling for 5 seconds.

Can be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
消灭目标后在 6 秒内填装：
+20 瞄准辅助、-20% 瞄准圆锥范围、[?] 瞄准时的操控性，持续 5 秒。

该增益持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Sol Invictus buff from Sunspots lasts twice as long (5 >> 10 seconds).

Sunspots you create now affect allies, granting them the Sol Invictus buff for 10 seconds.

Sol Invictus on Allies:
• 100% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
• 20-40% decreased Passive Super Drain
• Restoration x1

While Aiming Down Sights with <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

While above 50% Magazine:
Direct Hits create a Stasis burst which applies 50 Slow for <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds to enemies within 4 meters.

Only activates once per shot/burst. (Wolfpack Rounds are considered separate shots.)

Whisper of Durance increases slow duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] seconds
descriptions.zh-chs:
前半弹匣直接命中敌人时：
将产生一个冰影爆炸，附近 [?] 米内的敌人获得 50 层减速效果。持续 <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] 秒。

每次射击仅触发一次效果。
（狼群弹药可触发多次。）

耐久之吟 可将持续时间增加到 <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Reviving or being revived grants you and allies within 15 metres a 100HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
Leaving the 15 metres radius removes Overshield
If the wearer loses Overshield, so too does everyone else.

Heals you and allies within 15 metres for 60(?)HP after getting a Weapon Kill with a Matching Subclass Element with a 3 second cooldown.
Super Abilities can generate 25%|33%|(?)% more Orbs of Power per Activation with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

While Last Guardian Standing or Solo:
20 Range, 20 Stability, 50 Reload Speed, and 10 Aim Assist.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你成为火力战队最后存活的成员或单刷时：

可提高 20 填装速度、 20 稳定性、 10 瞄准辅助和 10 射程。

descriptions.en:
On Grenade Ability Usage:
Changes your Weapon Element to match the selected Subclass until stowed.

Passively Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
15% Increased Damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed.

Lasts until you're out of combat and works while stowed.

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 🡅5.5 seconds.

🡅 In Combat Timer is extended by 0.5 seconds

Passively Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|20? Aim Assist with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Accuracy Cone Size
• 0.75x ADS Animation Duration Multiplier

Upon Blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
50% Increased damage for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
做出防御动作的 0.5 秒内成功格挡敌人伤害：
+50% 伤害，持续 2 秒。

descriptions.en: Grants 7.77% Increased Damage against Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses.
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对强大的战斗人员、首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.

Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that has no damage falloff and deals 30% increased damage in PVE.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 15% Bodyshot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on the Precision Multiplier.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Total damage remains the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier
Breaking a Combatant Shield with the matching Elemental Damage Type grants 1 Stack of Armor Charge.

Finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Precision Kill reduces Firing Delay by 30% for 6 seconds.

Buff can be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在精准击杀后 6 秒内装填：
提高射速（降低 30% 射击间隔），持续 6 秒。
该增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

On Weapon Kill, for 7 seconds:
• 30 Stability
• 1.45x Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
• 3-3.5° Precision Aim Angle
• -95%(?) Accuracy Cone Size
• -95%(?) Accuracy Cone Growth.

Only applies to hipfiring.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Each shot grants 🡅-6.25% Accuracy Cone Size, 🡅-12.5% Accuracy Cone Growth, and 🡅1.25 Stability while holding down the trigger.

Reaches maximum strength after 🡅8 shots.

🡅 Effect reaches maximum strength 2 shots sooner.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and grant allies an Orb of Power.

Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Grants 30|50|60 Resilience with 1|2|3 Mods equipped while you have active Armor Charges.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Upon dealing damage with all your weapons within [?] seconds of each:
35% increased damage for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 [?] 秒内使用所有武器造成伤害后：
提高 35% 该武器伤害，持续 10 秒。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Weapons matching your Subclass Element:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Refills magazine upon breaking a Combatant, Barrier, or Guardian Shield.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员、勇士、或守护者的护盾时：重新装填弹匣。

若能量武器与战斗护盾元素类型吻合，击中目标时可重生弹药。

descriptions.en: Radar stays active while aiming down sights.

Upon blocking damage with the Glaive Shield:
20% increased Projectile Damage for 🡅5 seconds or until no longer blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased by 1 second.

Starts Health Regeneration and restores 80 HP upon reaching 100% Activation Progress with Weapon Kills.

Activation Progress by Enemy Rank:
• Minor Combatants: 33.3%
• Players: 66.6%
• Majors and Bosses: 100%

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器连续击杀 3 名敌人时：
开始生命恢复，恢复总值约为 80 点。

普通敌人记为 1 个击杀。
守护者记为 2 个击杀。
精英、强大敌人、首领记为 3 个击杀。

连续击杀敌人需在 5 秒内完成。

descriptions.en:
Increases Strand Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.
Rapid precision hits create a lightning storm at the point of impact.

If hipfiring:
• 25 Stability
• 15 Aim Assist
• 2.7° Larger Precision Aim Angle
• -15% Accuracy Cone Size
• 20% Increased:
    • Aim Assist Falloff Distance
    • Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance
    • Damage Falloff Start and End Distance

The Damage Falloff Increase does not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Stronger Effect.
Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.

Loads 🡅3 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.

🡅 Loads 1 more Ammo at a time.
Super Abilities can generate 25%|33%|(?)% more Orbs of Power per Activation with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

When a Class Ability Charge is consumed:
Grants Class Ability Energy based on the number of Mods equipped and consumes active Armor Charge Stacks.

Each Stack of Armor Charge is the equivalent of an additional Kickstart Mod.

Ability Energy gains with 1|2|etc. Mods equipped:
<:pve:922884406073507930>13% | 16.7% | 23.4% | 31% | 37.5% | 41.2% | 44.4% | 46.8% | 48.7%
<:pvp:922884468275019856>Ability Energy gains are halved(?) in PVP.

Upon Sliding:
• Refills 15% of the Magazine
• 20 Range and 30 Stability for 3 seconds or until firing

Only active for the first shot (of the burst).

0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 射程，+30 稳定性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。
仅第一发子弹有效。

0.3 秒冷却时间，但一次滑行中快速射击可触发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en:
On Ammo Finder/Normal Ammo Brick Pickup:
Grants an additional 3-5% of your Maximum Reserves to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons matching the Ammo Type.

Guarantees at least 1 more Ammo on Pickups.

By default, normal Ammo Bricks grant 25-33% of your Maximum Reserves.
Increases the Maximum Number of Armor Charge Stacks you can hold from 3 to 4|5|6 with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

On Orb of Power Pickups:
Grants 5%|7.5%|10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Equipping multiple Root of Nightmares Weapons grants increased Handling, Reload Speed, as well as Increased Damage against Tormentors, Lucent Hive, and Enemy Players in Super.

Bonuses with 2|3 Root of Nightmares weapons:
• (?) | 20 Handling
• 0 | 20 Reload Speed
• 0.95x Reload Duration Multiplier
• <:pve:922884406073507930>3.33% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>9.98% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?%] Increased Damage

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Picking up an Orb of Power grants 1 Stack of Explosive Light. Maximum of 6 Stacks.

Consumes 1 Stack per Shot, granting 100 Blast Radius, [?]% larger explosion radius, and Increased Damage.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased Impact and Explosive Damage.

Grenade Launchers: Increases total damage by 52%.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每拾取 1 个能量球获取 1 层爆炸光能，提升伤害并 +100 爆炸范围。

最高叠加 6 层。每次射击消耗 1 层。

榴弹发射器：提升 65% 至 84% 爆炸伤害。总伤害量提升约为 52%。

火箭发射器：提升 25% 冲击伤害和爆炸伤害。

descriptions.en:
Reduces Incoming <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 🡅12 Range, 30 Reload Speed, and narrows the Accuracy Cone by 🡅7.5%.

🡅 Grants 2 more Range, (?) more Reload Speed, and narrows the Accuracy Cone by a further 2.5%.

On hit against Minor Combatants:
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection, up to a maximum of 20 Stacks.

On hit against Major or Boss Combatants:
Grants 20% increased damage for 1 shot per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.

Consumes 1 stack per hit if at 1-5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at 6-20 stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中普通敌人时：
获得 1 层转向增益，最高叠加 10 层。

命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。

当增益层数不高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 1 层增益。
当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
Upon getting a Kill from any source matching the alignment (Light/Darkness) of the weapon:
Grants 20% Increased Damage for 6 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc, <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar, <:void:720178940240461864>Void
Darkness Alignment: <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis, Strand

Grants the following to <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

descriptions.zh-chs: +5 瞄准辅助

descriptions.en:
Enables hipfiring while in Lift, and passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness while hipfiring.

Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds:
• High Lift: 2.6  🠚 4 (54% increase)
• Stafe Lift: 2.2  🠚 4 (82% increase)
• Catapult Lift: 1  🠚 4 (300% increase)

Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling, and a 0.6x Ready/Stow Duration Multiplier to Submachine Guns.

While holding an SMG:
• Grants 50 Mobility
• Reduces ADS Movement Penalty to 9% (from 25%)
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%

Refills the magazine of Submachine Guns 1 second after stowing them.

Passively Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25% and Slide Distance by 33%. Sprinting for 1.5 seconds grants Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.

On Melee Hit with Linear Actuators active:
Applies Shocked debuff to the hit enemy. Shocked enemies chain <:pve:922884406073507930>220 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[85] <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage to targets within 20 meters and spread the Shocked debuff.

Shocked lasts 2 seconds and its duration is refreshed on chains. Shocked Players are immune to further chains for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后，获得"线性促动器"，持续 7 秒。

在近战命中时:
"线性促动器"对敌人施加震荡 2 秒，释放一个连锁电弧，当另一个敌人在 20 米范围内时就会连锁。震荡会在连锁时被刷新。

[PVE] [?] 伤害
[PVP] 85 伤害。在震荡状态下对额外的连锁伤害免疫，持续 2 秒。

+6.25% 冲刺速度
+33% 滑行距离

descriptions.en: This weapon does more damage to enemies based on the number of SIVA nanites that attach to them.

Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown after activation.

Class Ability Energy Gain with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Aeon Weapon Haste for 6 seconds.

Aeon Weapon Haste grants 10 Reload Speed, a 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier, and 10 Ready/Stow Handling.

On Champion Stuns and Miniboss or Boss Kills:
Allies within 30 meters gain 50% Grenade and Melee Energy. Aeon Allies not using Sect of Force additionally gain 10% Super Energy.

4 second cooldown between activations.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 2.5 秒内完成 4 次精准攻击会获得“永劫教派武器加速”增益，持续6秒。

“永劫教派武器加速”提供 +10 填装速度（附带 0.8x 填装动画系数），对拔枪/收枪动作 +10 操控性。

在击晕勇士、次级首领或者首领时：
• 30 米范围内的队友获得 50% 的手雷和近战能量。
• 永劫教派队友额外获得 10% 的超量能量。

触发间隔 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Matching Elemental Shield Break:
Explosion disorients enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破属性相匹配的元素护盾时：
爆炸可使 7 米范围内敌人迷失方向，持续 5 秒。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Passively grants:
• 30 Airborne Effectiveness
• 25% increased Blink distance.
• [?]% Decreased Blink Cooldown

On Blink: grants 100 Ready Handling and Radar remains active.
descriptions.zh-chs:
被动提升 +30 空中效率。

+25% 闪烁距离。
并减少 [?]% 闪烁冷却时间。

当闪烁时：
+100 操控性（对拔枪动作），并且使雷达保持活跃状态。

descriptions.en:
•  Arrows fired while aiming down sights cause Sacred Flames to instantly detonate.

•  Precision hits with perfectly drawn arrows increase the power of this detonation.

Upon getting a Kill from any source matching the alignment (Light/Darkness) of the weapon:
Grants 20% Increased Damage for 6 seconds.

Can activate and stay active while stowed.

Light Alignment: <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc, <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar, <:void:720178940240461864>Void
Darkness Alignment: <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis, Strand

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1(?) second.
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 2.5 seconds of stowing it.
descriptions.es:
Rellena el arma, si esta guardada, luego de 2.5 segundos

Mejorado: El tiempo de activacion se reduce a 2.3 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs: 武器收起 2.5 秒后重新装填弹匣。

descriptions.en:
Increases Grenade Impact Damage by 50%.

Due to the ratio of Explosive and Impact Damage being tied to Blast Radius on Grenade Launchers, a lower Blast Radius Stat will provide a higher overall damage increase.

Total Damage Increase depending on Blast Radius:
• Special Grenade Launchers: 25-12.5%
• Heavy Grenade Launchers: 15-7.5%
descriptions.zh-chs:
+50% 榴弹直击伤害。

因爆炸伤害和直击伤害的比例和榴弹发射器“爆炸范围”属性相关，故尖刺榴弹起作用时，更低的爆炸范围可造成更高的总伤害。

单发榴弹发射器：
• 0 爆炸范围：+25% 总伤害 | • 100 爆炸范围：+12.5% 总伤害

重型榴弹发射器：
• 0 爆炸范围：+15% 总伤害 | • 100 爆炸范围：+6.25% 总伤害

descriptions.en:
Grants a 0.8x|0.75x|0.7x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier to Strand Weapons with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stow Duration cannot be reduced below the Duration at 100 Handling.
Grants 4%|5%|6% Class Ability Energy on Orb of Power Pickups with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Hard-hitting two-burst fire.
Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.
The further a Void orb falls, the more powerful its detonation becomes.

Elemental Kill grant 1 Stack of Recombination.
Maximum of 🡅8 stacks.

Each Stack increases the damage of the next shot by <:pve:922884406073507930>🡅12.5% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[🡅6.25%].

🡅 Damage Buff ramps up 25% faster, reaching maximum strength 2 Stacks sooner.
Grants 30 Magazine Stat. Identical to Extended Mag.

On Miss:
Primary Weapons have a 35% chance to refund ammo.
Special and Power Weapons have a 20% chance to refund ammo.

While inside a Rift or Well of Radiance:
+100 Reload with 0.9x RDS to all Guardians inside.

While inside an **Empowering Rift** or Well of Radiance:
100% Increased Damage Falloff Distance.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当站在裂隙或光焰之井内时：
为所有在内的守护者提供 +100 装填速度，0.9 倍装填动画系数。

当在**强能裂隙**或光焰之井内时：
增加 100% 的伤害衰减距离。

descriptions.en:
Refreshes held weapon after sprinting for 1.5 seconds.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Crouch Speed is set to 4 metres per second and cannot be decreased through slows debuffs.

Refills stowed weapons from reserves upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill.

descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 6 秒内完成填装：
重新填装 收起的武器。

被动提升 +20 填装速度。

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Ranges between 20 HP to 80 HP for a full magazine.

根据填装之前完成的命中数恢复生命值。

可恢复生命值为 20 至 80 点。

descriptions.en: Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% increased damage in PVE.
Detonation time varies on draw and distance.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 15% Bodyshot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on the Precision Multiplier.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Total damage remains the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:

引爆延迟和距离相关。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Scoring 3 Precision Hits refunds 1 Ammo to Magazine.

Counter is reset if no Precision Hits are scored within 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 次精准命中后，向弹夹内装填 1 枚弹药。
两次精准命中时间间隔不得超过 2 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upon readying a Sword:
30% Increased damage for 🡅1.5 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased.

Deals increased damage against Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles, as well as Players in their Super Ability.

<:primary:968793055677251604> Primary Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[40-50%]
<:special:968793055631114330> Special Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>15% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10-20%]
<:heavy:968793055652106320> Heavy Weapons: <:pve:922884406073507930>10% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5-10%]

The weapon needs to be equipped when the shot hits the target for the Damage Buff to be applied.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability and Guard Resistance (Swords).

Upon emptying the Magazine:
Partially refills the Magazine from reserves based on the number of Hits scored.

Hits to Returned Ammo Ratio:
• 50-60% on <:primary:968793055677251604> Primary Weapons
• 30-40% on <:special:968793055631114330> Special Weapons
• [?]%-[?]% on <:heavy:968793055652106320> Power Weapons

根据命中次数重新装填弹匣。

回弹比例：
主武器 50-60% | 特殊武器 30-40%

10% | 21% | 33.1% increased damage for 4.5 seconds.

完成武器击杀时:
提高 10% | 21% | 33.1% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。

Hits against Non-Matching or Barrier Champion Shields deal increasingly higher damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

Damage Increase:
• Fusion Rifles: 🡅34.8% per hit, up to 🡅522%
• Machine Guns, Auto/Pulse/Trace Rifles: 🡅39.96% per hit, up to 🡅600%
• Linear Fusion Rifles: 🡅180% per hit, up to 🡅540%
• Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles: 🡅199.92% per hit, up to 🡅600%

🡅 The damage buff is increased by 20%. (e.g. 150% » 180%)

Grants Stat Bonuses depending on the number of Charged Abilities.

Stat Bonuses with 1|2|3+ Charged Abilities:
• 5  | 15 | 25 Stability
• 5  | 25 | 50 Reload Speed
• 10 | 25 | 50 Handling
descriptions.zh-chs:
根据完全充能的技能数量提升属性状态。

三个完全充能的技能达到最大效果。

•  +5 | +15 | +25 稳定性
•  +5 | +25 | +50 填装速度
•  +10 | +25 | +50 操控性

Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

Explosion Damage based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant):
• Powered Melee on Minor: 250
• Finisher on Minor: 333
• Powered Melee on Miniboss: 416
• Finisher on Miniboss: 500
Unknown for other Enemy Ranks.
Well-rounded, reliable, fires a 3-round burst.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

Solar: 50 Reload Speed

Void: 20 Stability

descriptions.zh-chs:
根据当前的分支职业增加属性：

火： +50 填装速度

descriptions.en:
On Miss:
Primary Weapons have a 35% chance to refund ammo.
Special and Power Weapons have a 20% chance to refund ammo.
This weapon has a well-rounded adaptive grip, reliable and sturdy. Kills with this weapon reload Sturm and overflow a bonus damage round into it.

Weapon Kills grant Grenade Ability Energy:
• <:primary:968793055677251604>Primary and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 10%
• Most <:special:968793055631114330>Special Weapons: 20%

Kills with Glaives, Grenade Launchers, and Trace Rifles only provide 10%.

Using your Grenade Ability refills the Magazine.
3 second cooldown between Magazine Refills.
descriptions.zh-chs:
<:primary:968793055677251604> 主武器和 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重武器击杀可获取 10% 手雷技能能量。
大多数 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊武器获取 20% 能量。

使用手雷技能将 重新装填 弹匣。
重新装填效果有 3 秒冷却时间。

descriptions.en:

0.75x Draw Time Multiplier for 🡅4 seconds.

🡅 Buff duration is increased by 1 second.

Upon blocking damage with Glaive Shield:
Decreases Glaive Block's Movement Speed Penalty to 20(?)% for [?] seconds, or until you stop blocking.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用偃月阻挡伤害时：
提高敏捷[?]持续 [?] 秒，或直到你停止阻挡。

descriptions.en:
Refills stowed weapon from reserves after 🡅2.3 seconds of stowing it.

🡅 Activation time is reduced by 0.2 seconds.

Reduces Incoming <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

在电弧法杖超能状态下：

• 反弹的弹道造成 650% 的额外伤害。
• 反弹弹道可为队友产生能量球。

descriptions.en: At 10 stacks of Rewind Again, a small portal will open, shooting bullets from an alternate timeline version of this weapon. Precision hits extend the portal's duration.

Randomly grants 10% to 50% Increased Magazine Capacity upon reloading.

Always rounds up.

🡅 Improves the average overflow amount.
Weapon Fires Full Auto. Identical to the Gameplay Setting.

1 second after stowing Kinetic Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

1 second after stowing Strand Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Weapon Kill:
Grants 8% Ability Energy split equally amongst all uncharged abilities.

Abilities with multiple charges only receive one third of the ability energy normally split to them once they have a full ability charge ready.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用武器击杀时：
获取 8% 的技能能量，平均分配到所有未充能的技能中。

如果你有 3 个以上技能充能完毕， 该 perk 将不会生效。

descriptions.en:
While Aiming Down Sights with Strand Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

Grants Melee Ability Energy upon dealing Grenade Ability Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gain with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

If no enemies are within 15 meters:
Grants 10 Range, 30 Reload Speed, and narrows the Accuracy Cone by 5%.

Upon Picking Up <:special:968793055631114330> Special or <:heavy:968793055652106320> Heavy Ammo:
Magazine gets overflowed to 200% of its regular capacity from reserves.

Activates even if stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
拾取 <:special:968793055631114330> 特殊或 <:heavy:968793055652106320> 重型弹药：
武器使用备弹过量装填至 200% 弹匣量。

武器收起时也可触发。

descriptions.en:
Powered Sword Hits apply Slow for <:pve:922884406073507930>4.25 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds.

Light Attacks apply 40 Slow.
Heavy Attacks apply 60 Slow.

Scoring 2 Precision Multikills creates an Orb of Power for allies.

Finishers spawn Ammo Bricks for allies based on [enemy rank](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant):
• Elites: <:special:968793055631114330>Special Ammo Brick
• Miniboss or Champion: <:heavy:968793055652106320>Heavy Ammo Brick

Spawned Ammo Bricks grant 33% less ammo.

Aeon Allies not using Sect of Insight gain 35% Increased Damage on Finishers for 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
2 次精准多杀会为队友掉落一个能量球。

终结一个精英敌人会为队友生成一盒特殊弹药。
终结一个次级首领会为队友生成一盒重弹药。

永劫教派同伴额外获得 35% 的伤害增加，持续 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants Class Ability Energy upon dealing Melee Damage. 7 second cooldown between activations.

Class Ability Energy Gain with 1|2+ Mods:
<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

Heals you to 70 HP on Kill if Critical.

Generates 5% Class, Grenade, and Melee Energy every time you take damage.

1 second cooldown between activations.

Upon scoring a Powered <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Melee Kill:
Refunds used Melee Ability Charge and starts Health Regeneration.
descriptions.zh-chs: <:arc:720178925317128243>电弧近战技能击杀可恢复生命值并回复全部近战能量。

descriptions.en:
Weighted Throwing Knife gains a second bounce with greatly increased tracking.

Scoring 3 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Strengthened Throwing Knife for 10 seconds.

Additional Precision Hits increase buff duration by 5 seconds each, up to 30 seconds.

Strengthened Throwing Knife deals <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] increased damage and stuns Unstoppable Champions. Buff is consumed on Knife Hit.
descriptions.zh-chs:
权衡飞刀可以弹跳两次，跟踪能力大大增强。

在 2.5 秒内完成 3 次精确命中：获得强化权衡飞刀。
每完成一次精确命中，持续时间增加 5 秒，最多可增加到 30 秒。

强化权衡飞刀造成 <:pve:922884406073507930>200% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%] 额外伤害，并可击晕势不可挡勇士。

命中敌人将消耗强化权衡飞刀。

descriptions.en:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Grants an extra Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.
All Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
(Eg: Both are recharged on Gambler's Dodge)

Interaction with Knock 'Em Down Aspect while Radiant:
• Knife Kills restore 1 Charge.
• Knife Trick Precision Kills and Direct Ignition kills in which Knife Trick applies Scorch restores 2 Charges.

On Weapon Kill for 7 seconds:
• 30% Increased Damage
• 20% Longer Firing Delay/Charge Time/Draw Time
• 10 Range

Bows and Shotguns only receive a 20% Damage Increase.
descriptions.es:
Luego de una baja:
Aumento de daño en un 30%, aumento 10 al alcance y disminucion de 20% a la Cadencia de Tiro o Velocidad de Carga durante 7 segundos

Arcos y Escopetas solo reciben un 20% de aumento a su daño

La Cadencia de Tiro tiende a cambiar hacia el proximo armazon mas lento. Por Ejemplo: Fusil automatico de Precision => Fusil automatico de Alto Impacto

Mejorado: La duracion del bufo aumenta a un maximo de 8 segundos
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器击杀后 7 秒内:
+30% 伤害
-20% 射速/充能效率
+10 射程

弓箭和霰弹枪仅 +20% 伤害。

descriptions.en:
While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 🡅40% Weapon Energy (up from the base amount of 25%).

🡅 Energy Bonus on Hit is increased by an additive 5%.

1 second after stowing <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

15% Increased damage and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9 meters per second.

🡅 Buff duration is increased.

Grants 100% Class Ability Energy on Ally Revival.

Casting Super fully heals allies within 30 meters.

Aeon Allies not using Sect of Vigor additionally receive a 110 HP Overshield for 20 seconds that starts recharging after 3 seconds if not broken.
descriptions.zh-chs:
队友死亡时你可获得 25% 的职业技能能量。

施放超能能在 30 米范围内完全治愈队友。

<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

Picks up Ammo and refills all Weapons from reserves.

拾取弹药盒并从备弹中 重新装填 所有武器。

可触发弹药拾取相关特性。仅在可以拾取弹药时触发。

• 60 Guard Endurance
• 60 Charge Rate

刀剑击杀时：
提升刀剑充能效率、防御持久、防御效率、防御抗性。
直到收起刀剑。

40% Increased Damage.

+40% 伤害。

Grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness per stack for 5 seconds. Maximum of 2 Stacks.

Grounded Weapon Kills grant 1 Stack while airborne kills grant 2 Stacks.
descriptions.es:
Mientras la vida esta baja:
Hasta +60 de Eficacia en el Aire

El efecto aumenta linealmente mientras la vida disminuye. Efecto maximo cuando la vida esta en estado critico

Otorga +10 de Eficacia en el Aire de forma pasiva

descriptions.zh-chs:

+30 空中效率，持续 [?] 秒。

被动提升 +10 空中效率

恢复 67 生命值。

<:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] | <:pve:922884406073507930>25% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[12.5%]

descriptions.zh-chs:
+15 空中效率
+5 操控性

descriptions.zh-chs: 直接命中的冲击伤害 +10%，总伤害等效增加约 2.2%。

descriptions.en:
Upon finishing a reload within 🡅8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Overflows Magazine based on the amount of kills scored within 🡅8 seconds of each.

Maxes out at 150% increased Magazine Capacity. Always rounds magazine up.

Magazine Capacity Increase per Kill:
<:primary:968793055677251604>Primary Weapons: 20%
<:special:968793055631114330>Special and <:heavy:968793055652106320>Power Weapons: 10%.

🡅 Passively grants 5 Reload Speed. Allowed time between kills is increased by 1 second.

1 second after stowing <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.

While blocking and stationary:
Glaive Projectiles Hits grant 35% Weapon Energy (up from the base amount of 25%).
descriptions.zh-chs:
保持不动举起护盾时：
远程命中可提供额外 50%(?) 武器能量。

descriptions.en:
Upon Void Invisibility ending:
Grants Volatile Rounds for <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] seconds.

On Finishers while affected by Void Invisibility:
• Grants 35% Increased Damage for 6 seconds
• Grants you and allies within 24 meters the Reserve Overshield buff

Reserve Overshield:
• Grants 375% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate
• Grants the user a 40 HP Void Overshield for 10 seconds on Class Abiliy usage
• Buff is removed on Class Ability usage
descriptions.zh-chs:
在虚空隐身结束后的 <:pve:922884406073507930>6 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3] 秒内，获得 <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%] 武器伤害增加。

隐身期间的终结技会在 [?] 米范围内的敌人施加挥发性效果，并使24米范围内的你和盟友获得备用护盾和375%额外的基础职业能力再生速度，直到死亡或使用职业能力。

备用护盾在你施放职业能力时激活，为你提供40 HP的虚空护盾，持续10秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Precision Kill:
• Target explodes, dealing <:pve:922884406073507930>104 <:pvp:922884468275019856>80 Solar Damage in a 4 meter radius.
• Grants 50 Reload Speed for 6 seconds.

Explosions inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).
descriptions.zh-chs:
精准击杀时：
目标将爆炸，在 3 米范围内造成 80 点火元素伤害， 6 秒内 +50 填装速度。

对战斗人员将乘以 1.3 倍的伤害系数，之后再计算战斗人员等级相关的系数。

descriptions.en:
Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Weapons of Sorrow.

Melee Hits apply Poison.

Necrotic Poison ticks every <:pve:922884406073507930>0.5 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[0.7] seconds for <:pve:922884406073507930>19 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] ticks over <:pve:922884406073507930>10 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] seconds. Total of <:pve:922884406073507930>1366 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[?] damage.

Necrotic Poison deals <:pve:922884406073507930>34 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[5?] damage at base, with each tick dealing 7.7% more damage than the last one inside PvE.

Poisoned enemies (from any poison source) spread poison on death in a 5 meter radius.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a Weapon matching your Subclass Element.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Reduces Incoming <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Damage from PVE Combatants by 15%|25% with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

The effects of different Resistance Mods stack multiplicatively with each other.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.
Gain increased handling and reload speed when standing near allies. Firing this weapon also grants Wolfpack Rounds to nearby allies wielding non-Exotic Rocket Launchers.

Passively grants:
• 35% Increased Projectile Velocity
• 10 Reload Speed
• 0.8x Reload Duration Multiplier

🡅 Reload Speed Bonus is increased.

While Aiming Down Sights with <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapons:
Grants 25%|35%|40?% Flinch Resistance with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of Flinch Resistance.

Scoring multiple hits against a single target emits 3 damaging shockwaves from its location at the time of activation.

Each shockwave deals <:pve:922884406073507930>(?) <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20.33] damage over a 5 meter radius. Shockwaves inherit the weapon's [Combatant Damage Scaling](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b57Hb8m1L3daFfUckQQqvvN6VOpD03KEssvQLMFpC5I/edit#gid=933547097).

Hits Required for Activation:
• Pulse Rifles, Sidearms: 12
• Scout Rifles: 6
(?) second cooldown between activations.

Grants an extra Skip Grenade Charge.

Skip Grenades spawn an additional drone (4 -> 5)
Drones chase enemies much more aggressively.

Skip Grenades hits grant <:pve:922884406073507930>10% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[3%] Grenade Ability Energy.

Dealing Melee Damage grants 10 Aim Assist and 10 Range for 10 seconds.

Dealing additional Melee Damage while the Buff is active extends the duration by 10 seconds, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
造成近战伤害会使此武器在 10 秒内 +10 瞄准辅助、+10 射程。

再次造成近战伤害可延长 10 秒持续时间，最高 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Powered Hits grant a 3% Damage Buff for 3.5 seconds. Stacks 10 times for a 30% Damage Buff.

Additional Powered Hits refresh the duration. Blocking removes all stacks.

Increases <:void:720178940240461864>Void Weapon Damage while you have active Armor Charges:
<:pve:922884406073507930>PVE: 10%|17%|22% Increased Damage with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
<:pvp:922884468275019856>PVP: 3%|4.4%|5.5% Increased Damage

Armor Charge now decays over time at the rate of 1 every 10 seconds by default.

While Crouched:
• 🡅35 Handling and 🡅25 Stability
• -40% Accuracy Cone Size
• -17% Accuracy Cone Growth
• -80% Horizontal Recoil

Effects are halved on Fusion Rifles.

🡅 Grants 5 more Handling and Stability.
Fires full auto with deeper ammo reserves. Faster reload when weapon is empty.

Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with with a Strand Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing an additional 25% Explosive Damage.
(Overall 20% increased total damage)

Highlights enemies below 50% HP enemies in a red outline, and Enemy Guardians with Fully-charged Supers in a yellow outline.

50% Additional Base Grenade/Melee/Class Regeneration Rate.

被动提升 +15 空中效率。

+50% 手雷、近战、职业技能充能效率。

Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds.
Maxes out at 20 seconds.

While Abyssal Extractor is active:
300% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate.
200% Additional Base Class and Super Regeneration Rate.

Nova Bomb returns Super Energy on Kills, up to 50% Super Energy.

Arc Ability and Jolt Kills grant Conduction Tines for <:pve:922884406073507930>7 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[4] seconds. Maximum of 3 Stacks.

175% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 22% 超能消耗速度降低。

350% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 44% 超能消耗速度降低。

3层“导电针时”
525% 额外基础手雷、近战、超能冷却速率 | 66% 超能消耗速度降低。

超能消耗速度降低会影响到所有游走型超能，混沌之触除外。

火箭可追踪敌人 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP 时追踪效果减弱]

On Guardian Kills while below 63 HP:
Grants an Enhanced Radar and removes you from passively appearing on opposing radar for 10 seconds.

Firing weapons still pings enemy radar once per shot.

低于 63 点生命值时，守护者使用此武器造成最后一击：
在 10 秒内提供强化雷达，并将你从敌方雷达上移除。

descriptions.en: Grants 2 Stacks of Armor Charge on Orb of Power Pickups.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Finishers consume 3 Stacks of Armor Charge and generate a Special Ammo Brick for everyone.

Finishers consume 3 or more Stacks of Armor Charge and grant a 45 HP Void Overshield.

Overshield lasts 8|10|12|14 seconds with 3|4|5|6 Stacks of Armor Charge consumed.

Echo of Persistence increases Duration by 50%.
Finishers consume 1 Stack of Armor Charge to fully heal you.

Grants 40 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance.

在 6 秒内为此武器提供额外 40 操控性、 20% 后仰抖动抗性。

持续时间无法被刷新。收起武器时仍然有效。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] Disorients Minors and Elites for 5 seconds.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Muffles audio, briefly disorients, and removes radar for 5 seconds.

descriptions.zh-chs:
躲闪时：
向 22 米范围内的敌人施加迷惑。

迷惑的效果：
• [PVE] 使普通和精英敌人混乱5秒。
• [PVP] 扭曲声音并在 5 秒内移除雷达，并短暂致盲。

迷惑不会造成伤害。

descriptions.en:
Using your Class Ability while within 15 meters of an enemy grants Super, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

Hunters:
• (?)|(?) Super Energy with 1|2+ Mods equipped

Titans:
• (?)|(?) Super Energy with 1|2+ Mods equipped

Warlocks:

• [?] Aim Assist

🡅 Passively grants 5 Stability.

Grants a 100 HP Overshield for 16 seconds if at 4 Overcharge Stacks.

descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+35% 伤害，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法被刷新。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

15 Stability, 15 Reload Speed, and 0.75x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier

descriptions.zh-chs:

~15 稳定性、15 装填速度、0.75x 操作动画系数。

15 米内有 2 个以上敌人时：
~40 稳定性、55 装填速度、0.56x 操作动画系数。

descriptions.en: Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% Increased Damage.

descriptions.zh-chs:

提升 6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。

击杀可刷新持续时间，近战击杀直接获得 5 层增益效果。

descriptions.en:
Gain 1 Ammo after scoring 3 Powered Hits within 2(?) seconds of each.

🡅 Allowed time between Hits is increased.

descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对普通敌人的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Any kills reduce the required time to 1.5 seconds. Triggers even if stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs: 脱离战斗时获得 40 装填速度。

Powered Melee Hits instantly cast Smoke Bomb.

Smoke Bombs deal 50% increased damage. Quickfall does not receive increased damage.

Dealing damage with Smoke Bomb grants Truesight for 3 seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 metres away.

15% Increased Damage, 100 Handling, and 100 Reload Speed.

Lasts until you're out of combat and works while stowed.

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within the last 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续处于 战斗状态 12 秒后：
+15% 伤害， +50 操控性，+50 填装速度。

持续到脱离战斗，收枪状态也会触发。

• 25% Decreased Duration on <:special:968793055631114330> Special Weapons

增加的装填速度与苦涩怨恨叠加的层数相关，当重新装填或收起武器后将失效。

Thundercrash deals 100% increased damage.

On Thundercrash Deactivation:
Grants a 100 HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
雷霆冲击提升 100% 伤害。

当雷霆冲击释放完成时：
在 7 秒内获得 100 生命值的覆盖护盾。
覆盖护盾持续时间会根据雷霆冲击释放距离而延长，最高为 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
Grants the following to Strand Weapons:
• 10|15|18 Reload Speed with 1|2|3 Mods equipped
• 0.85x Reload Duration Multiplier

Refills 🡅20% of the Magazine on Weapon Kills.

🡅 Refill amount is increased by an additive 10%. (3% on SMGs and Auto Rifles)

While in Arc Staff:
• Blocking with Whirlwind Guard doesn't consume extra Super Energy.
• 50% reduced Super Drain

Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve a portion of unspent Super Energy.
Instantaneous Deactivation refunds 62.5% Super Energy.

Kills refill the magazine while Last Guardian Standing.
Does not activate when playing solo.

Passively grants 30 Magazine stat. (Identical to Extended Mag)
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你是火力战队中唯一生还的成员：
每次最后一击都会刷新弹匣。

被动提升 +30 弹夹容量。

descriptions.en:
Spawns an Orb of Power upon scoring 2 Kills within (?) seconds of each with a <:solar:720178909361995786>Solar Weapon.

Spawned Orbs of Power grant 2.5%|3.25%|(?)% Super Energy with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon in Arc, Solar, and Void modes to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants in the Throne World, PsiOps Battlegrounds, or the "Vox Obscura" Exotic quest will unlock these objectives faster. Defeating Champions provides bonus progress to all 3 objectives.

Multiple Weapon Kills within [?] seconds of each spawn a Dawning Gift that remais on the ground for 10 seconds.

Picking up Dawning Gifts grants 10% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy, restores 20 HP, and starts Health Regeneration.

Activation progress on Kills by Enemy Rank:
• Minors and Guardians: 16.66%
• Majors and Bosses: 50%

Using your Class Ability while within 15 meters of an enemy grants Super, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.

Hunters:
• (?)|(?) Super Energy with 1|2+ Mods equipped
• 3.5%|6% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy

Titans:
• (?)|(?) Super Energy with 1|2+ Mods equipped
• 4%|7.2% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy

Warlocks:
• (?)|(?) Super Energy with 1|2+ Mods equipped
• 7%|12% Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy

Weapon fires Full Auto. (Identical to the setting)

Grants 10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Taking any Damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

🡅 Buff Duration is increased.

Taking any Damage while Guarding increases Lunge Distance by 80% for 1 second.

Guarding while being shot at by or receiving Healing Effects (inlcuding the Restoration Buff) from allies also activates the perk currently.

Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Grants 20|35|40 Inventory Size Stat to Strand Weapons.

Total Ammo Reserves are determined by the Inventory Size and Magazine Stats.

Increases Damage by 15% for 7 seconds on Weapon Kills.

Matching Grenade and Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.

The 50% Damage Buff can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

🡅 The 15% Damage Buff Duration is refreshed to 8 seconds if a weapon kill is made while it is active.

On Weapon Kill:
Applies 30 Scorch to enemies within 4(?) meters.

Ember of Ashes increases this to 40 Scorch.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the radius to 8 meters.

Damage from Scorch can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs and Debuffs.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
对 [?] 米范围内的敌人造成 30 层灼烧效果。
骨灰余烬会将灼烧效果增加到 40 层。

击杀强大的战斗人员或敌方守护者可将范围增加到 8 米。

灼烧伤害可以因武器特性、敌人负面效果、战斗人员阶级而增加。

descriptions.en:
1 second after stowing <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Weapons:
Refills 10%|10%|15% of the Stowed Weapon's Magazine with 1|2|3 Mods equipped.

2.5|2 second delay between further Refills with 1|2+ Mods equipped.

Does not work with Breech-Loaded Grenades Launchers and Rocket Launchers.
